content: what is linux #OS operating system, ok now what is OS ok just forget about the operating system do you know hardware hardware which is cpu, ram, cd drive , usb etc but to work them there is a software or controller which commands the hardwar to do , that type of environment will be provided by operating system we can make software to do some action with hardware like audacity which is a software the linux provides platform the software to run and like that operating system is very important
